thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge
thread.title_full: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge
text:
Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge   19,   
TOKYO, Japan - Japan Airlines (JAL) will maintain current levels of fuel surcharge on all international passenger tickets purchased in Japan between October 1 and November 30, 2015. 
JAL sets fuel surcharge levels bimonthly based on the 2-month average price of Singapore kerosene-type jet fuel. The price of Singapore kerosene-type jet fuel during the two month period of June and July 2015 averaged US$70.17 per barrel, which accounted for 8,665 yen in the average exchange rate of 123.49 JPY/USD during the same period. As a result, with reference to the fuel surcharge benchmark list for FY2015 in Japanese yen, this corresponds to Zone C of fuel surcharges. From October to November 2015, it will range from 500 yen on a Japan - Korea ticket to 10,500 yen on a Japan - USA ticket per person per sector flown, on tickets purchased in Japan. 
Fuel Surcharge for the period: October 1 ~ November 30, 2015 
Current Level: Zone C 
(Applicable till September 30, 2015) Unchanged Level: Zone C (Applicable on/after October 1, 2015) 
Based on average price of fuel: JPY 8,979/barrel JPY 8,665/barrel 
Route (Per person per sector flown) For sales in Japan For sales in Japan 
Japan - Korea, Far East Russia JPY 500 JPY 500 Japan- China, Hong Kong, Taiwan JPY 2,500 JPY 2,500 Japan- Guam, Palau, Philippines, Vietnam JPY 3,000 JPY 3,000 Japan- Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand JPY 4,500 JPY 4,500 Japan- Hawaii, India, Sri Lanka, Indonesia JPY 6,000 JPY 6,000 Japan- Canada, Europe, Middle East, Oceania, USA (excl. Hawaii) JPY 10,500 JPY 10,500 
- The surcharge applies to flights operated by Japan Airlines as well as code-share flights operated by other airlines. 
- The planned level of fuel surcharge is subject to government approval. 
Fuel Surcharge Benchmark List for FY 2015 Priced in Japanese Yen Sales in Japan Below 
6,000 Yen Zone A Zone B Zone C Zone D 6,000 Yen
